about_the_game:
💼 Backroom Company: Welcome to the Early Access Version!

Async Corporation (hereinafter referred to as Backroom Company) is a game that explores survival in the mysterious backrooms. In the Early Access version, you can experience various maps and challenges, where proving your research achievements requires not only collecting items but also recording anomalies and creatures using your camcorder.

🕵️‍♂️ What You Can Experience in Early Access:

  • 🏨 Explore Additional Maps: Experience survival challenges in environments like 'Hotel', 'Swimming Pool', and 'Parking Lot'. Each map has unique atmospheres and dangers.

  • 👹 New Creatures: Each map introduces new creatures that heighten the tension of survival.

  • 🤝 Multiplayer Support: Cooperate with your teammates to achieve goals and survive. Utilize teamwork to escape the dangers lurking in the backrooms.

  • 🔍 Objective Completion & Item Collection: Gather items, complete missions, and clear each map. Use your camcorder to capture 'anomalies' and 'creatures' found in the backrooms, collecting essential research data.

🕵️‍♂️ What to Expect in the Full Release:

  • 🚧 New Maps & Expanded Exploration Areas: The full version will feature even more thematic maps, including 'Sewers', each with unique atmospheres and challenges.

  • 👾 New Creatures: Additional creatures tailored to each map, providing a more intense survival experience.

  • 🔧 Deeper Game Mechanics: More refined strategy elements and advanced mechanics to elevate the complexity and tension of exploration.

⚠️ Important Notes:

The Early Access version offers a chance to experience an expanded part of the backroom universe in advance. The full version will include a story ending, Steam Deck and various controller support, additional maps, creatures, and themed environments, so please look forward to it!

🎯 Game Overview:

Async Corporation (hereinafter referred to as Backroom Company) is a professional research organization that studies a supernatural phenomenon known as 'Noclip', which generates randomly connected rooms. However, no records remain on who founded this company or why it exists. Many explorers hired for research have lost their way in the labyrinthine spaces or vanished without a trace under mysterious circumstances.

You must track down the traces left by your predecessors and collect strange artifacts that can only be found in locked rooms. However, merely collecting items is not enough to prove your research achievements. Recording 'anomalies' and 'creatures' with your camcorder is also a crucial part of your mission. Securing sufficient research data may be the key to your survival.

The Main Control Room allows you to buy and sell necessary exploration items. Choose your equipment carefully before starting your research. Since the number of items you can carry is limited, strategic preparation is essential.

Once you select a stage, the tightly shut elevator doors will open, and your research will begin. If you die during the exploration, you can still escape as long as your teammates reach the required funding goal. However, failing to achieve the goal five times will cause the Control Room to shut down permanently, and the exploration will be terminated forever.

Utilize your radio to maintain communication with teammates. If you stray too far, your radio signal may cut off, drastically lowering your chances of survival. Even if you're injured, there may still be ways to assist your teammates back in the Main Control Room.

The backrooms defy logic, and what resides within them cannot be easily explained.

If bacteria appear, do not look back and run. They are unimaginably fast and cannot be killed. If there is a locker nearby, hide immediately—it's your only chance to survive.

If you encounter a parasite with a deformed head, make no sound. It cannot see you, but it will detect even the slightest noise. Move cautiously.

But is the danger you face really just an accident?

The middle manager of Async Corporation (Backroom Company), Blagos, always delivers encouraging messages to researchers, but more and more people have started questioning his true intentions. Some researchers suspect that the 'accidents' in the backrooms are not random but rather part of a controlled experiment.

The more anomalies and creature records you collect, the more you begin to notice a strange pattern. Recording these phenomena is a required step for research, but you may start questioning who this research truly benefits.

Every experiment is perfectly controlled.

You just haven't realized it yet.

Wishing you the best of luck.

Oh, and one more thing—no matter how frustrated you get, never kill your teammates.
detailed_description:
Special Edition

🎉 Join Our Official Discord for Exclusive Perks! 🎉

✨ Special Rewards – Only for our Discord members!
🤝 Direct Access to Developers – Get quick feedback and updates!
🌍 Connect with Global Players – Find your perfect party worldwide!
🎮 Explore the Backrooms Together – Team up with new friends for thrilling adventures!

Don’t miss out on these community-only perks! Join the fun and become part of the Backroom Company family today! 👾💬

name: Backroom Company

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows8/10/11
  • Processor: i5-10400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardward raytracing supported graphic card(RTX 2060)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realteak
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows8/10/11
  • Processor: i7-10700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realteak

short_description: Backroom Company studies 'Noclip,' a supernatural phenomenon creating randomly linked backrooms. Its founders and purpose are unknown. Many explorers hired have disappeared in backrooms. Players trace past expeditions, farming unique items. Goal: deliver them to the main control room's dumbwaiter.
supported_languages:
English*, Korean, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
